trans-unit.source: Provides ambient property values to top-level controls.
trans-unit.target: Gir omkringliggende egenskapsverdier til på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a property on a control that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en egenskap i en kontroll som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have a parent and the property is not set, the control tries to find the value of the ambient property through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke har en overordnet hendelse, og egenskapen er ikke angitt, kontrollen prøver å finne verdien for egenskapen omkringliggende via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not sited, the site does not support ambient properties, or the property is not set on the AmbientProperties object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> uses its own default values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke er plassert, området støtter ikke omsluttende egenskaper eller egenskapen er ikke angitt for AmbientProperties-objektet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>bruker sine egne standardverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Some objects derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class might set the property even if you do not.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte objekter som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen kan angi egenskapen selv om du ikke gjør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class always sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse alltid angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient background color of an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende bakgrunnsfargen for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If there is no ambient background color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen omkringliggende bakgrunnsfarge, verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of an object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir bakgrunnsfargen for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient cursor of an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende pekeren til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If there is no ambient cursor, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen omkringliggende pekeren, og verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor of an object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerer pekeren til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient font of an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende skrifttypen for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If there is no ambient font, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen omkringliggende skrift verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the font used when displaying text within an object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som representerer skriften som brukes ved visning av tekst i et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient foreground color of an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den omsluttende forgrunnsfargen for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If there is no ambient foreground color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen omkringliggende forgrunnsfarge, verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the foreground color of an object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer forgrunnsfargen for et objekt.
